name: Up All Night: Daybreak
description:
Night after night, nightmare after nightmare.

Despite the passage of time, Nick Torres just can’t seem to shake the ghosts of his past… and one ghost in particular -- much to Nick’s chagrin -- has found his way back to the waking world.

Felix returns in this short kinetic novel, eager for a conversation.

Will Nick indulge him? ...Does he have a choice?

Up All Night: Daybreak is a direct spin-off of Up All Night, and contains a multitude of spoilers. As such, players are encouraged to experience Up All Night before proceeding with Daybreak.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1690880/Up_All_Night/


Kinetic story
5,000+ words
Custom artwork
Original soundtrack
Emotionally traumatized Nick Torres
